// Pivot 0, 0
int FlipperR[22] = {
	42, 1,
	49, 3,
	52, 8,
	52, 15,
	49, 19,
	42, 21,
	8, 18,
	3, 16,
	1, 11,
	4, 6,
	9, 5
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float FlipperR[22] = {
	0.777778f, 0.041667f,
	0.907407f, 0.125000f,
	0.962963f, 0.333333f,
	0.962963f, 0.625000f,
	0.907407f, 0.791667f,
	0.777778f, 0.875000f,
	0.148148f, 0.750000f,
	0.055556f, 0.666667f,
	0.018519f, 0.458333f,
	0.074074f, 0.250000f,
	0.166667f, 0.208333f
